segments.text: Good evening , this is housekeeping . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . This is room 207 . There isn't any hot water in my bath room . Can you send somebody here , and do something about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . We'll be there shortly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am glad you are here ! See if you can find the problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are welcome . It's our job to keep things running smoothly .
segments.speaker: S1
